name: Gods of All
description:
The plot of this game is based on mythology of people from Perm-Volga region, Russia. 

You will take the role of god Omel.

Omel is one of two higher Demiurge deities in komi-permyak mythology.

Omel is the antagonist of Demiurge god Yen. His name means “bad”, “disgusting”.

Control:

WASD - moving
Space - jump
Shift - acceleration
E - interaction
Enter - special action

Authors:

Ilya Gorbachev - programming

Savely Bakturin - music

Eugeny Vorobyov – some graphics

Game_deatH - translation
